installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Update package list and install dependencies
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq

# Clone the repository and copy files to root directory
git clone https://github.com/cptcr/discord-development.git /tmp/discord-development
cp -r /tmp/discord-development/handler/* /mnt/server/
rm -rf /tmp/discord-development

# Install Node.js dependencies
cd /mnt/server
if [ -f "package.json" ]; then
    npm install
fi

# Install TypeScript globally
npm install -g typescript

# Install additional packages if specified
if [ ! -z "${ADDITIONAL_PACKAGES}" ]; then
    npm install ${ADDITIONAL_PACKAGES}
fi

# Uninstall specified packages
if [ ! -z "${UNINSTALL_PACKAGES}" ]; then
    npm uninstall ${UNINSTALL_PACKAGES}
fi
